active_incidents.title: Slack not loading for some users

notes.body:
We have begun deploying a fix and it's rolling out to everyone gradually.

We appreciate your patience as we roll this out and restore normal service for everyone.

We believe we have identified the cause of this issue and are working on a fix. We'll be back with an update soon.

Please use Slack in a browser window in the meantime if possible.
We're investigating reports of Slack not loading for some users. We'll share an update once we have more information, we appreciate your patience.
